segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and it's quite a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is completely on that one task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink, oh my, the sink is absolutely overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing over the front edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a growing puddle right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to have no idea what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little anxious to see such unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water damage is going to be quite a problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside seems a world away from this indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly absorbed?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to tell her to look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a domestic disaster waiting to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
